nodes.text: Agent Thom Clessigan was assigned to operate undercover in Glorga the Hutt's organization on Hollast VII as one of the gangster's lieutenants. Clessigan witnessed the Trandoshan mercenary kill fellow agent Lanish Ran in the Spilgan complex. Clessigan promptly arrested Ran's killer.
Clessigan took the shuttle Protector to transport Nakaron to the Republic detention facility on Dles IV. On route, Nakaron escaped and hijacked the shuttle, taking Clessigan and the crew hostage.
